sentences.sentence: Thrombocytopenia is one of the most common bleeding disorders of animals.
sentences.translation: 血小板减少症是动物最常见的出血性疾病之一。

sentences.sentence: HUS is characterized by acute renal failure, haemolytic anaemia and thrombocytopenia.
sentences.translation: 溶血尿毒综合症的特点是急性肾衰竭、溶血性贫血和血小板减少。

sentences.sentence: Platelet disorders are either quantitative (thrombocytopenia or thrombocytosis) or qualitative (thrombocytopathy).
sentences.translation: 血小板疾病是定量的(血小板减少症或血小板增多症)或是定性的(血小板病)。
